snippet.title: Mutant Fighter arcade gameplay video
snippet.description: Mutant Fighter (Also known as Death Brade in Japan) is a 1991 fighting game created by Data East. This arena style fighting game is a cross breed of fighting and wrestling. Players can choose from 8 different characters to achieve fighter supremacy. Power bar features allow characters to do a Super Throw  when the bar is full.
